extendedInfo.description: The Next Generation Fidelity App for Androidâ¢ is a powerful mobile solution providing you with real-time analysis, research, and trading tools in the palm of your hand. Access brokerage and workplace savings accounts*, with the ability to trade stocks, options, ETFs, and mutual funds. Great features like Fidelity BillPayÂ® and mobile check deposit offer added convenience, while real-time quotes and advanced charting make finding new investing opportunities even easier.Whatâs in our Next Generation Fidelity App for Androidâ¢:Customizable Home ScreensAn industry-firstâcustomizable home screen options give you immediate access to the information thatâs most important to you. Choose from key, tile-based screen options such as your accounts, a heat map view of your watch lists, U.S. Markets, World Markets, Market Movers, and more.Advanced ChartingFrom the quote screen, simply rotate to landscape mode to access a fully interactive advanced chart. You can layer technical indicators onto the chart (e.g. moving average, exponential moving average), or compare the performance of two securities.News & VideoStay on top of breaking market news with our all-new news experience, complete with film-strip headlines and streaming market update videos four times a day.Alerts and Push NotificationsReceive timely, customizable alerts via push notifications, or visit the message center to view and manage streaming alerts.Enhanced Cash Management and Equity Dividend InformationBanking enhancements, including access to your credit card details such as balances, payments and rewards, and a cash management overview page that includes current balance, interest earned, and ATM fee rebates. Plus, detailed dividend information for your equity investments.To learn more about Fidelity's App, check out our video atwww.fidelity.com/android.* Workplace savings account functionality is limited to viewing account information only. The images are for illustrative purposes only.Fidelity, Fidelity Investments and the Pyramid design logo are registered service marks of FMR LLC.Fidelity Brokerage Services LLC, Member NYSE, SIPC, 900 Salem Street, Smithfield, RI 02917631706.4.0

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: App is user friendly, easy to use. Works great on my Galaxy S2.  Would be better if my checking history showed the nickname for my credit card payment.  With 2 people in the household I have 2 discovers etc
reviews.author: Debra Nita

reviews.title: It gets the job done
reviews.comment: There\'s about a 10 min delay in quote price.  With the latest version, I cannot get out of the trade alert screen
reviews.author: Tri Le

reviews.title: Solid application
reviews.comment: Keeps me up to date with my investments, trades, etc.  Never had a problem.
reviews.author: Daniel Schwarz

reviews.title: Just ok...
reviews.comment: On your recent symbol lookups, you can\'t delete ones that you don\'t want on there anymore so you have to view them every time. Fix this annoying glitch!!!
reviews.author: Ramond Huffman

reviews.title: Latest update is horrible
reviews.comment: The \"streaming\" function now slows this app to a crawl on a 4G network...Come on guys!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well.. mostly
reviews.comment: I like the layout and capabilities. I just want to be able to trade more than 10k shares without calling a rep every time.
reviews.author: Rob Campbell

reviews.title: Works great on my s3
reviews.comment: App used to have issues but has worked great for a long time now. No glitches or anything. All functions work. I look at balances,  trade stocks, deposit checks, research investmens. Everything works. I thought the interface was strainge but once I used it its actually great. Two thumbs up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Today I sold some stock and bought another stock in just a few moments from my smart phone. It was actually quicker than signing in on my computer and doing the trade. I am also watching other stocks and, for me, I have to give this 5 stars. I am adding info. The people on the help line are some of the best in any business I work with. I am very pleased with the way this app works on my tab too. Can trade internationally by setting up a special platform too. Wow! Nice!
reviews.author: James R

reviews.title: What were you thinking Fidelity?
reviews.comment: The new update to full view is terrible. I can\'t scroll Down all my accounts and transactions as well as no refresh. Give me the old version. I\'ve been a user for years.
reviews.author: Mike Crosby

reviews.title: Too limited, unnecessary nagging
reviews.comment: It needs more research tools: such as trailing returns for securities.  Sure, I can get graphs, but I\'d like real numbers, too.  When I \"get performance info\" it puts me into a browser but doesn\'t log me in, so many features aren\'t available.    Also, why does it insist in putting a notification in the status bar when, after 15 minutes of inactivity, it logs me off.  If I\'m  not using it, then I don\'t really care: it\'s just one more bit of noise.
reviews.author: Allen Tracht

reviews.title: Irresponsive and slow
reviews.comment: The recent updates to the app has made it very irresponsive and slow.  if u read this comment then please try to fix it asap. Thanks.
reviews.author: Nadeem Yasir

reviews.title: App makes calls?! WTF?
reviews.comment: This app requires access so it can make calls to any number, which may result in unexpected carrier charges. Why would anyone install it then? POS!
reviews.author: Almir Besic

reviews.title: Keeps getting worse... Galaxy Tab 8.0
reviews.comment: This app has diminished since first started using. It now does not let me manage price triggers, crashes whenever I use the back button,  will not connect to news on quote details, app needs alot of bug development it\'s not getting better.  I\'ll just use the website and un install app if it gets worse.  Cmon a brand new samsung galaxy 3 tab should be a target for optimization.
reviews.author: Russ M

reviews.title: Easy to use, where\'s my money!
reviews.comment: This app is pretty sweet. I can easily see my balances, perform transfers, and do simple stock/ETF/mutual fund trades. And you can easily deposit checks with your smartphone camera. I ditched my sorry bank and now do everything with Fidelity.
reviews.author: Victor Ureno

reviews.title: TERRIBLE FOR TABLETS
reviews.comment: But it\'s worth it. The new layout is truly optimized for phones, however the tablet app is horrible! It\'s the best finance APP FOR PHONES period. If you have problems with it not opening, you have to uninstall it first and then reinstall it (irritating) . It will work perfectly after that. There is a learning curve and it\'s not quite intuitive, but once you get used to it, you\'ll love the new  features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No SD Card Support
reviews.comment: No longer able to store on SD card.  Requires too much storage space on my phone - uninstalling ...
reviews.author: Robert Taylor

reviews.title: What were they thinking.
reviews.comment: This WAS a great app.  Easy to use and informative.  Now it rarely opens and is cumbersome to use on the rare occasions it\'s useable.  Bring back the old app please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This update needs work
reviews.comment: The new version of the app freezes frequently or crashes when streaming quotes are enabled. A crash is a sure thing when a watch list contains an invalid symbol. Last but not least, the app miscalculates the total value of options when in position view by treating each contract is a single share rather than as 100 shares.
reviews.author: Chuck Chiavarini

reviews.title: ROTH IRA
reviews.comment: Able to make trades, check balance, deposit checks. Interface continues to improve.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent Apps. Recommended
reviews.author: James Kim
